and **before accuracy modeling**.

### `data_cleaned/`
This folder contains the **accuracy-cleaned dataset** produced by
`05-acc-preprocessing.qmd`.

- Files are derived from the combined trial-level dataset

- Accuracy variables are ready for statistical modeling

Downstream analyses (e.g., `06-acc_analysis/`) read from this directory.
